generic.minNumberLength error: The value must not be less than ${min}

delete-modal.heading: Delete {entityName}
delete-modal.body: Do you really want to delete this {entityName}?
delete-modal.body-with-id: Do you really want to delete the {entityName} {entityId}?

model.name: Aircraft type
model.maximumTemperature error: Maximum temperature must be greater than minimum temperature
model.massAndBalanceData cgPosition x: X coordinate (relative to center of gravity)
model.massAndBalanceData cgPosition y: Y coordinate (relative to center of gravity)
model.aircraftResources performaceModelInfo: The performance model to validate flight plans and perform remaining energy calculations
model.aircraftResources maxDurationToCsflInfo: For every point in flight a CSFL site must be in reach within this duration
model.aircraftResources voltageThresholdInfo: Specify the voltage level that should show a warning to the pilot
model.flightPlanning maximumTurnAccelerationIn: Maximum turn acceleration in coordinated flight
model.flightPlanning maximumTurnRateInCoordina: Maximum turn rate in coordinated flight

delete.forceDelete error: An Error Occured, Try to Force Delete Again

additionalInfo.type: The name or title of the aircraft type
additionalInfo.validFrom: Select a date after which this aircraft can be used
additionalInfo.validTo: Select a date until this aircraft can be used
additionalInfo.productLine: Select the product line this aircraft type belongs to
additionalInfo.minimumTemperature: Enter the minimum air temperature for operation
additionalInfo.maximumTemperature: Enter the maximum air temperature for operation
additionalInfo.maximumWindSpeed: Enter the maximum wind speed for operation
additionalInfo.relativeHumidity: Enter the maximum air humidity for operation (in percent)
additionalInfo.maximumPrecipitation: Enter the maximum precipitation for operation
additionalInfo.minimumVisibility: Enter the minimum visibility for operation
additionalInfo.airDensity: Enter the maximum air density for operation
additionalInfo.basicEmptyMass: Enter the weight of the aircraft without any load and without any resources listed under 'aircraft resources'
additionalInfo.maximumTakeOffMass: Enter the maximum take off weight including all resources and load for this aircraft

errorMessages.listEmptyError: At least one value must be set
errorMessages.maxCharacterError: Please don't enter more than {maxCharacter} characters
errorMessages.maxReferencedAttributeValueError: This value must be less than the "{referencedAttributeLabel}" value. The maximum value is {maxValue}
errorMessages.maxValueError: This value must be less than {maxValue}
errorMessages.minReferencedAttributeValueError: This value must be greater than the "{referencedAttributeLabel}" value. The minimum value is {minValue}
errorMessages.minValueError: This value must be greater than {minValue}
errorMessages.numericOnlyError: This must be a numeric value
errorMessages.referentialValueDependencyError: This value is invalid as it would affect the {referencedEntitiesAttribute} of {referencedEntitiesType}
errorMessages.maxForeignReferencedAttributeValueError: This value must be less than or equal to the "{referencedEntityAttribute}" attribute of the referenced entity "{referencedEntityType}" which is {maxForeignValue}
errorMessages.minForeignReferencedAttributeValueError: This value must be greater than or equal to the "{referencedEntityAttribute}" attribute of the referenced entity "{referencedEntityType}" which is {minForeignValue}

additionalInfo.msn: Aircraft manufacturer's serial number. Must be an integer
additionalInfo.aircraftType: Select the type this aircraft belongs to
additionalInfo.aircraftRegistration: Official registration number of this aircraft. Can be an alphanumeric code prefixed with a country code
additionalInfo.services: Select which type of flight missions this aircraft can perform
additionalInfo.validFrom: Select a date after which this aircraft can be used
additionalInfo.validTo: Select a date until this aircraft can be used
additionalInfo.technicalStatus: Tracks the serviceability of the aircraft. Can be synced with AMOS or other MRO tools
additionalInfo.homebase: Select the location where this aircraft is usually parked and maintained
additionalInfo.crewConfiguration: Choose if this aircraft has a pilot onboard or if it will be remote controlled
